channel.title: How to change npc max hit
channel.description: how do you change the max hit of only a certain npc without changing their hp?

item.title: How to change npc max hit
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

if you do that, however, you will be unable have working defence against npcs, because this sets their hitDiff from zero, it is easier to just use:

npcs[NPCID].MaxHit = ##;

rather then

hitdiff = ##;

for the reason stated above.

If you are too lazy to create working defence, then it really doesn’t matter.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change npc max hit

item.title: How to change npc max hit
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

What source are you using? Dodian?

Don’t know if this will work for any other sources, but it might.

Go in Npchandler.java under NPC Attack Animations, or just search for:

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType ==

Under them add this:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == npcid) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(maxhit);

Change the maxhit and npcid to the ones you want.

Example:

} if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2881) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(35);

Which means Npc 2881 (Dagannoth Supreme) will hit a Max of 35, and a lowest hit of 0.

Read full topic
